title: I Wanted a Divorce, But My Husband Became Obsessed With Me
The Caring Young Lady Wants to Be a Wall
summary: Irina de Claudel is reincarnated as a mob from her favorite BL game. She is trying to get Henri and Noel, her favorite coupling, to get together, and while she is taking care of them, they both love her...! All I want to do is to be a wall...! Will Irina be able to bring them together? A slapstick love comedy in which you will be loved by the characters of a BL game!

title: I Took Away the Tyrant’s Virginity
summary:
“After all, a man must have big breasts… … .”

The man's chest visible through the sunlight is very handsome... … .
for a moment. Who are you naked next to me?

"Emperor… … your majesty?"

Unbelievable.
Unintentionally at a masquerade ball
It seems like he spent the night catching a tyrant.

“How dare you take away the emperor’s virginity and leave?”

No, last night was an agreement!

“If you knocked me down on the bed, you will be responsible.”

yes?
The look in your eyes that silently urges me to answer... … .

“I will take responsibility for the book, Your Majesty.”

I curled my tail.

title: I’m the Villainous Male Lead’s Terminally Ill Aunt
summary:
She became the nanny of Claude, the blackened male protagonist who would destroy the world. If this continues, she will be killed by the cursed power possessed by the blackened male protagonist. So, she decided to pour out her love for the blackened male protagonist to prevent the blackening.

She also raised the child’s self-esteem, and made the Duke act like a proper father, as fatherly love was essential for the male protagonist’s self-esteem.

She thought the child was gradually recovering his bright face, and the Duke was now learning how to gradually give love to the child.

But she doesn’t know if it’s because she worked too hard….?

“It has always been a problem. You have hundreds of reasons to abandon me, but I don’t have a single one.”

“Nanny will always be by my side, right? That’s why you can’t go. Never, never.”

Two men started obsessing over me.

title: Live as a Villainess
summary:
"If you were to disappear… I might just lose myself."

Arcs is reborn into the world of the wildly popular otome game Celestia Kingdom. He thought he was just a background character—until it’s revealed he’s actually the childhood friend of the final boss!

Determined to avoid the bad ending, he throws himself into his daily life as her servant. But it seems the true cause of her descent into darkness is… her childhood friend!?

A slightly (maybe more than slightly?) yandere heroine and an obliviously overpowered protagonist—an unpredictable tale of master and servant begins!

title: Don’t Tell Me You Think Cultivating Immortality Is Difficult?
summary: A humble rookie seeks the path to immortality — only to accidentally join a sect full of pretentious con artists. His seven senior brothers brim with confidence, taking turns spouting out fabricated divine techniques. But no one expected this newcomer to be a genius. He actually comprehends everything — even their nonsense! In the end, the master falls into despair. Just who is this junior disciple?

title: Reincarnation of the Fist King
summary:
In the VRMMORPG Versus Online, Kazuya was known as the Fist King. But when he defeated the Labyrinth King Pharaoh, he woke up and had somehow been transported back to when he was 12 years old! Moreover, this world is a game world where monsters exist?! However, he can no longer use his once-invincible fists, and his stats are all at beginner level. For now, Ichiyo starts by practicing swinging a wooden staff for eight hours a day...

In a world where heavy weapons reign supreme, he aims to become the strongest by utilizing analog weapons, his fists, and the cheat skills he alone knows from the game world!

title: Level 999 Goblin
summary:
The protagonist Kim Chulsoo works his ass off for a living as a manual laborer in real life and by grinding for and selling items in a game.

He finally gets the chance to switch to a hidden class, hoping for that one big shot in life…!

But the hidden class turns out to be... a Goblin Summoner?!

title: Sister, I Am the Queen in This Life
I Just Want To Mooch Off Your Luck
summary: After being reborn, Zhao Mingxi had no choice but to mooch off of Fu group's young master's luck to avoid death by terminal illness. Although his ears would turn so red as if they're bleeding whenever he sees her, he still keeps up an act of prideful indifference: "Can you stop being so clingy?"  The next day, Zhao Mingxi really did leave to mooch off of someone else's luck. The small dog bowed his head down, and grumbled: "I'll let you cling to me, alright? Happy now?"

title: Artifact-Devouring Player
summary:
Sanghyeon has the uncanny ability to absorb powers of magical artifacts — by devouring them. But it took him thirty years to master, and at fifty-five, it’s too late to escape mediocrity. 

Then one day, he’s miraculously sent back in time to the fateful day he awakened his powers as a monster-hunting player. 

With a chance for a do-over, he wastes no time using his ability to its full potential, rapidly absorbing incredible powers and rising through the ranks, determined to become the hero he always dreamed of being.

title: Making Love in a World Where It’s Taboo
summary:
"You want to make a baby with me, right?" Having never made love before, The Prince and his wife are in for a steamy night. Once they get a taste, they'll never be able to go back.

(Source: Coolmic)

title: The Heavenly Demon Wants a Quiet Life
summary: After a lifetime of bloodshed, the Heavenly Demon longs for peace. In his final moments, he uncovers the truth about his power and yearns for a different life. He wakes up in the body of Taesan Byeok, the frail second son of a powerful merchant family, barely clinging to life. Using his knowledge from his life as the Heavenly Demon, Taesan must navigate a world of temptation and corruption to survive. As his martial arts reputation grows, new enemies emerge to disrupt his quiet life. Yet, Taesan is determined to live on his own terms, despite the chaos around him.

title: The Almighty Daughter Runs The World
summary:
After traveling through time and space, Ye Zhuo became a fake daughter of a wealthy family and a notorious bastard that everyone disdained. But so what? Although Ye Zhuo was dealt a bad hand, she would still win.

Ye Zhuo quickly made room for the real daughter of the wealthy family and then helped her mother and uncle get rich overnight.

As an unparalleled talented woman, she became the head of a technology firm and had a fortune of hundreds of billions of dollars, directly reaching the pinnacle of her life! Meanwhile, she was having a relationship with a wealthy tycoon who always doted on her!

title: I Became the Husband of the Cult Leader of the Demonic Sect
summary:
One of the Six Divine Clans of the Heavenly Demon Sect, the great heir of the Majin Jin Clan, Jin Yeomyeong.
Grateful for being born with a golden spoon in my mouth, I just wanted to enjoy a sweet life...
But damn that Murim Alliance — they destroyed the Heavenly Demon Sect.

And in the final moments of my life, the cult leader Cheon Yura says to me:
“Would you seduce me?”

title: I Became the Emperor’s Cat
summary:
After my sudden death, I was reincarnated in a strange world with a sultan and his harem, but not as a person, but as a kitten who can't talk!

I can only become human by kissing a prince who is worthy of the sultan...

After mistaking me for an assassin and treating me coldly, Prince Soliman says, "......It's soft, it's warm, can we stay here for a while?" as he approached me.

Prince Theron, who I thought was a sweetheart, seduces me by whispering, "Choose me over my brother, and I will give you everything you want." "I will give you everything you want," he whispered, seducing me.

I can't stay human unless I kiss one of them. "Nyaaong!" (Headache!)
How do I survive in this royal palace?

title: Wicked Husband
summary: To get out of her marriage, the owner of a nightclub plays dumb and fakes her ugliness. Who knew she'd catch the eye of her husband's uncle, a notorious warlord? Driven by his desire for her, the bloodthirsty general poached his nephew's bride. From then on, she's been the apple of his eye. "Nothing is more important than my wife," he proclaimed. "She belongs to me and no one else."

title: Logging 10,000 Years into the Future
summary: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!

title: World’s Strongest Troll
summary:
Arcadia.
The game that holds the most possibilities in the world.
Humanity’s first virtual reality game, made from the cooperation between the world’s leading companies:
Ajin Electronics. Sillicoff Industries. Argos Corporation.
The shocking stories that happen within the game begin now!

[Welcome to Arcadia, the world of fantasy.]

title: They Live in the Princess’ Flower Garden
summary:
In this new life Ibelia just wanted to be loved but she was born with the talent of a master of spirits, thanks to the seal of the king of spirits. She receives unconditional love from her parents and siblings, and is constantly chased by knights who want to be her guards. Furthermore, she also attracts the attention of several powerful men, who have ambitious plans for her. 

One of them is Ashrath, the king of demons and the only dragon in the other world, who wants to make her his bride. Another is Lelian, her childhood friend and the future emperor, who promises to build her an empire. And there are still others who hide their secrets and intentions. Ibelia will have to deal with them all, while walking along the flower path of an irresistible girl.

title: Awakening the Purple Thunder at the Beginning
summary: In the world of Blue Star, fierce beasts are rampant. Everyone can awaken superpowers and have the opportunity to become a strong man and dominate the world! However, Xu Jingming, who traveled through time, only had E-level superpowers. Fortunately, the Deep Blue System appeared, and the E-level weak electric superpower was upgraded to S-level Purple Thunder! Killing fierce beasts will earn you superpower points! Superpower points -1500000, Purple Thunder will evolve! SSS-level Chaos Thunder! Thus, the legend of Xu Jingming was left on Blue Star.

title: Limitless Ascension: Strength Amid Adversity
summary: With a system that grows stronger against it’s enemies, Ye Jun Ling who almost passed away from old age began his cheating life of cultivating with no upper limits. Divine emperor? Saint? The heavenly principles? Stand aside! Other than that, he also had several disciples. The senior disciple is a demonic sect master, with vicious heart and treacherous mind, but got easily taken care of everytime! The second disciple is a white hair loli, with the number one divine constitution, likes to cook despite being super strong, and serve her master…

title: Aristocrat’s Revenge
summary: No summary available.

title: Holy Emperor’s Grandson Is A Necromancer
summary: After a near-death experience, something has changed about the Holy Emperor’s troublemaker of a grandson. To be precise, his body was taken over by a Korean man who died while playing a VR video game! But when his necromancer character is mixed with a Holy Prince’s blood, things start getting funky. The zombies he makes are incredibly nice, his curses start healing people, and the girl he saved from being turned into a zombie suddenly gains super strength. Now he has to play the hero, but he’d really rather just go for a nap.

title: Demonic Evolution
summary: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!

title: Manager Kim
summary:
"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.

title: The Demonic Cult Instructor Returns
summary:
The Central Plains fell to the invasion of the Demon Realm.

A martial artist, Sa Bigang, was ultimately dragged into that infernal world. After surviving the brink of death and enduring hell itself, he awakens ten years before the invasion ever began.

And now, Sa Bigang sets out to stop the Demon Realm’s return.

To do that, he must restore order to the murim and build the ultimate force: the Undefeatable Corps.

As the man who will rewrite the past and safeguard the future…

This time, he will never lose.

title: Transmigrating to the Otherworld Once More
summary:
When the King’s Heart burns down, a being that transcends the fate of this world will arrive on this land!

The boy from Earth, Sung Sihan, brought down a tyrant and saved the world.

However, his happy ending was cut short when everything was taken away from him, and he was banished back to Earth.

After 10 years of gritting his teeth, he prepares for his return…

The hero who has already saved the world once re-enters Terranora!

title: Moonshark: Sharks Are Born To Be Stars
summary:
Princess Sid of the Underwater Kingdom is destined to inherit the throne of the sea. However, she becomes a fan of the land idol 'Raon', and she becomes eager to see her favourite star, so she runs away to the surface.
While leading a satisfying life as an ordinary fan, Sid's world is suddenly turned upside down when she meets the famous actor 'Jihan'. Unintentionally, the two keep getting entangled with each other, and Sid unexpectedly becomes an SNS star overnight…!!
This story captures Sid's journey of growth and love as she navigates her new life on land, discovering herself between the two worlds of the underwater kingdom and the human world.

---
Sid, who is a Shark Princess of the underwater kingdom, falls in love with Raun, a member of the boy band BUB, and runs away to the surface to see him. Things are going great until the famous teen actor, Jihan Kang, steps into her life unexpectedly and they keep crossing paths. Will Sid be able to keep her secret and get what she came up to the surface for?

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Now Come and Regret
summary: During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house. From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school.

title: If You Don’t Love, You Die
summary:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)

title: Newcomers Turn Low at Night
summary:
With a handsome face and manners that would put a diplomat to shame, new hire Lee Hyeonu is a sight for sore eyes to Senior Manager Shin Iyeon when he walks through the doors of Hanshin Worldwide. 

Feeling like she’s won the lottery, Iyeon is looking forward to her company life alongside this polite and hard-working young man— 

"Hey, Iyeon. Get this done by tomorrow." 

Hyeonu is no regular employee; he’s the son of the CEO. And as he begins to show his true nasty nature behind closed doors, Iyeon begins wondering what she did to deserve him.

title: Love Letter
summary: Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him... She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than many adults.

title: Book of the Dead
summary: Sumeragi Hotsuma, the blind "Sound Master," can kill Japanese demons with only the "sounds" made by the ring in his hand. His partner is high school student, Hiragi Ranku, adept at the strongest martial art, "Sappo" and blessed with the courage to fight any foe with her bare hands. A surprise, perhaps, that their enemies are "gods." Their battle takes place in Okinawa, a mystical island that protects Japan from evil gods and demons. This is a strange tale, which relates the mysterious history of Okinawa, myths from around the world and other world events with very precise imagery. Here exists a very, very strange world of fiction. The title, Narai Kanai means "Paradise" in the Okinawan dialect. In Okinawa, there is an island where the dead go to find eternal peace. Can Hotsuma and Ranku save Japan and provide these wandering souls with eternal peace?

title: The Way That Knight Lives As a Lady
summary:
The sword of my closest friend and trusted adjutant pierced my body. When I opened my eyes again, I had become a noble lady of the enemy kingdom. In an unfamiliar and weak stranger’s body, three year’s time was lost, in which my homeland was brought to ruin. I was unable to come to my senses because of the pain of betrayal and confusion of my identity. However, eventually I decided to live on as 'Luciphella Aidine', a noble who wields a sword.  


---

title: Cryptid
summary:
Robin is an ordinary high school student in South Korea.

On his way home from school as usual, an air raid warning sounds throughout the city, and an unidentified 'thing' takes away Robin's ordinary daily life.

Robin gets caught up in the fight between the 'monster', a being forgotten by humans for a long time, and the 'nameless unit' that protects humans... 

What the heck, this is scary!

title: Thiendavis – For The Perfect Salvation
summary: Evie Ariatte, a lovely saintess candidate, has her bright future shattered when a sudden curse forces her to answer every question with the truth. This unexpected twist of fate threatens her reputation and jeopardizes her dream of becoming the saintess. As her blunt honesty earns her both friends and enemies, will Evie uncover the hidden truths of Thiendavis and bring about its perfect salvation?

title: Love’s Impossible Quest: For the Broken young lady and the Duke of Dread
Magic Emperor
summary:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: What Remains in the Damaged Place
First Confession
summary:
"I want to sleep with you."
"... What?"
"I want to do it with Sung Ji-Won."

The day I turned 20. I spent the night with you, trying to make a memory. That's how we met again after 10 years, Joo Sung-Hyun, still handsome...

"Interest-free loan, limit is up to you, you don't have to pay it back."
"... What?"
"Keep going, acting like a live-in girlfriend."

You still threw the wrong fastball, and I caught it. Joo Sung-Hyun, what are your true feelings?

title: Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary:
Luke Foster thought he was doomed when he awakened as a Dragon Tamer, the most useless hidden profession in existence. 

Dragons are so rare and powerful that for eight centuries, no Dragon Tamer has ever succeeded in taming a dragon. But without one, he can't even unlock his basic skills, leaving him powerless in a world ruled by fighters. 
Then everything changes after Luke activates the **Super Treasure Map System**. The mysterious system leads him to the ultimate prize: a real dragon egg! And so, this "***weak***" Dragon Tamer is about to flip the world upside down.

title: Goddess’s Way of Attacking Tigers
summary: Moha, the sun god, was betrayed by her lover and died a miserable death. She realizes that she has returned to her past a year ago while being possessed by the body of an unknown woman. Moha struggles to prevent the tragedy of her past life. But, unexpectedly for her, her two tiger gods, who belonged to her in the past, spread their fervent courtship towards her.
